join hortbot 999 foobar 1

clock_set 2000-10-01T05:00:00Z

send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add untilshort (_UNTILSHORT_2000-11-23T06:32:22_)
send_any

send_any

send hortbot #foobar [HB] 7 weeks 4 days 6 hours 32 minutes

send hortbot #foobar [HB] 7 weeks 4 days 6 hours 32 minutes
